I tried many places there when I was out of delhi but not at all worked for me in terms of cost and treatment too. Dr Deepa is the buddy who worries about healthy teeth and perfect treatment not just pocket.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very very satisfactory and happy with her treatment. 
My all family members treatment done by dr. Deepa.
I also recommended her to other

I booked my first appointment with Dr Deepa a couple months back and had an excellent experience. I was petrified of a dentist visit for decades. This was my second visit in my life and that too after more than 20 years. 

I had a full check-up done where she gave me a full course of action for the multiple issues I had along with all the price variations. I also had a scaling done that left my teeth shiny. 

My second appointment was a few days back. I got three tooth fillings done -- all absolutely painless and most importantly, I couldn't even tell where my real teeth ended and the fillings began!

What I really loved was her easy-going nature and good humour which put me at ease and deleted my intense fear of dental work. She is also ready to answer all your questions patiently. The cherry on top: Her services come at a very reasonable cost!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ***** *** **** **** * *** **** ***** ***** *** ****
Despite having really problematic teeth, she was able to treat them with a great deal of patience and, most significantly, with positive outcomes. Starting with a cavity, moving through RCT, extraction, and finally contouring the teeth, everything was done with a lot of patience and passion for the job.

After all the appointments, I think my teeth and smile are perfect.

I would heartily advise visiting the dentist for any dental issues. And I'm certain that you'd leave the clinic smiling as well.

Dr. Deepa, thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I had an issue with my back teeth's fillings breaking frequently. My previous dentist would charge me for a new filling in the same tooth and claim one justification or another for the filling coming out on its own. I saw Dr. Deepa Singh after hearing about her from a colleague. She then took an X-ray of my teeth and suggested an inlay, a unique kind of ceramic-based filling that she said would be the greatest choice for my particular set of teeth. My treatment was gentle and without pain. They provided me with excellent service, and I am grateful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had implants done at a reputable dental clinic in Noida in February with the hope that they would be finished before my November marriage. But in August, the Implant became movable and came off. Since it was my front teeth and there wasn't much time left, I was quite concerned about how I looked. My friend advised me to get a second opinion at The Multispeciality Dental Clinic. Dr. Deepa Singh attentively listened to me and went over every treatment option available to me within a safe time period. Within 7 days, they provided a new fixed tooth that is just as nice as a natural tooth. I'm thankful to Dr. Deepa Singh a lot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am a corporate employee who is 23 years old, and my teeth were positioned forward. Despite visiting numerous dentists in my neighbourhood, I was never at ease with the idea of having to wear visible braces for a year. My buddy who lives in Noida recommended that I visit Dr. Deepa Singh, and when I looked up her profile on Practo, I was quite impressed. I appreciate the idea of having a single dentist who is skilled in treating a given dental issue handle each case. For my dental treatment, Dr. Deepa recommended that I use Invisalign. It’s little expensive but nothing good comes free. I choose the EMI facility.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: I had recently moved to a new city, so I was a little nervous to see a doctor other than my regular one. However, Dr. Deepa Singh was warm and understanding, and she immediately put me at ease. She looked over my situation and my medical history. My tooth condition was thoroughly explained to me, and I felt at ease listening to it because I had experienced a similar problem in the past. I underwent RCT, and I now feel much better, despite the fact that I have barely any discomfort. She is a dependable dentist, and I would highly suggest her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: My root canal procedure and some cavity fillings are currently being done. I've had several sittings thus far, and Dr. Deepa Singh always makes sure I'm at ease as she performs the procedures. The doctor is very professional and does a great job of explaining the problems and how the treatment will be provided. She answered all of the questions I occasionally had and provided clear guidelines for aftercare.Appointment scheduling is effectively handled. The clinic's personnel are all very kind.I'd highly recommend the doctor:

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: For my Re-RCT, tooth cleaning, and fillings, I visited Dr. Deepa. She has always been very kind and polite, and the way she handles difficult situations and treatments makes them easier. She put a lot of professional effort into my treatment by remaining calm and patient throughout. She always checks on me during the treatment to see if I'm comfortable, which is what I like the most. She also gives me enough time after the treatment if I have any concerns, and she always gives me an explanation and a solution or recommendation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Great place for your dental health. Dr Deepa treats you with lots of care and helps with any dental problems you may have. Have been going to her since my father took us over 10 years ago. Must recommend for dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Aesthetic Dentistry,Artificial Teeth,Cast Partial Denture,Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,
review: I’m very happy to treatment of my teeth, doctor’s behaviour is very excellent. God bless you Dr. Deepa Singh.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Post and Core,Zirconia Crowns,
review: My wisdom teeth (last upper molar) needed to be extracted and were in really bad shape. The pain was unbearable for a week until I saw Dr. Deepa, whose treatment plan was spot on and provided me with relief in just three days. After that, the extraction took only five minutes and was painless. The RCT procedure was then started on one of my other teeth. The entire process was properly explained in advance, and I prepared my schedule and my mind for the post- and core process. Similar to before, everything was done just as she had described to me. Because of her amazing work, I would highly suggest her to everyone. and follow up reminders taken care of by the clinic staff and Dr herself.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I would recommend Dr. Deepa for tooth related issues. Her politeness and expertise allowed me to recover more quickly than I expected. I went to her to have a small accident-related fractured front tooth fixed. She thoroughly examined the issue and recommended the best course of action for me. I underwent RCT, tooth crowning, and the necessary medical procedures and prescription drugs to manage the first pain I experienced. Even though I am aware that I had to have one of my front teeth crowned, I can now laugh and smile as before. :-) I thank it, Dr. Deepa.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had the absolute best dental care I've ever received. One of my friends strongly recommended it. Despite being 25 kilometres away from my house, the clinic was worth every kilometer I had to travel. The doctor had due to the availability of contact the entire time. No suggestions for expensive needless treatments. Doctor was flexible with appointment times and only performed what was required. In the modern world, when it is difficult to obtain honesty and trust, it is strongly advised to smile.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Before going to see Dr. Deepa, I had been to a number of dental offices for Invisalign and other alternative procedures. The key reasons I chose to work with her were her honesty and the clarity of the plans she presented during the consultation.

I have been receiving Invisalign treatment for a while and have noticed significant results. In terms of the assistance received and the effective performance, the experience has been excellent. I have never had a doctor that is so proactive about checking in with patients and actively monitoring their development.


It is also important to mention the clinic, which is a really hygienic place with professional employees.

Overall, really happy and wonderful experience. We now use Dr. Deepa as a family dentist.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Deepa gave me a very professional experience and thoroughly discussed the cause of my toothache and darkened teeth. She first identified the issue before describing the solution, a root canal. I actually sought a second opinion, which also supported the diagnosis and course of action. So I ultimately made the decision to see Dr. Deepa for a root canal. The doctor was knowledgeable, the rates were fair, the facility was neat and clean, and throughout the entire process, I experienced little to no pain. She also kept me fully informed about what to expect regarding what foods to eat and what to avoid, among other things.

Thank you Dr. Deepa for the care. I'll keep returning for my regular check-up.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I got my rct and caps done a few years ago, but I was not at all happy with it. I travelled from Banglore to the Multispeciality Dental Clinic for a dental examination and immediately fell in love with how brilliant Dr. Deepa was. Unlike other dentists, she was honest with me about my treatment and recommended the correct course of treatment. I was always scared to have my teeth treated, but I purposely extended my ticket to have her complete my treatment. I'd like to thank Dr. Deepa *** ***** *** **** ****** **** **** **** *** ** strongly suggest her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: One of my teeth was sensitive, and it got more sensitive every day. I was holding on going to the dentist because I'm afraid of getting my mouth treated. After doing some research on Practo, I decided to speak with Dr. Deepa Singh. She gave a thorough explanation of the entire procedure and patiently answered my questions, winning my trust and allowing me to have complete confidence in her while receiving treatment. I had nothing to fear because everything went extremely smoothly. I was aware that I was in capable hands. The facility is quite welcoming, hygienic, and Dr. Deepa has a very steady hand. I have no discomfort or annoyance. She made every effortto restore my natural teeth by doing fillings rather than RCTs. I must say that she has a very honest approach towards treatment and has a great facility to match her high level of skills.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Deepa Singh, M.D. It is important to note that my treatment was a truly great experience. I was scared to begin my treatment because of the RCT pain but I eventually finished and am now feeling better.

Dr. Deepa Singh was pleasant, smart, ******** and kind. She was friendly and considerate. She spoke intelligently on the issues, which I found to be quite appealing.

I've already given her recommendations to my family and friends, and one of my acquaintances, MR. Gita Prasad, was pleased with her care as well.

I should also emphasise the clinic maintenance in this Covid Pandemic as well as the staff's treatment of patients.

I sincerely appreciate it, Dr. Deepa Singh.

tags: Value for money,
review:
I arrived five minutes early since I had made a prior appointment. We were warmly welcomed and provided a hygiene package that covered our feet and hair. My teeth were inspected in the following ten minutes, and I received a briefing before going onward.

After my tooth problem had been fixed, I received a lesson.

I must mention that after a week, I am happy with the treatment.

The pricing was below expectations, which was the cherry on top.

I heartily endorse this doctor and her entire staff.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,
context: BPS Dentures Fixing,Endo Surgery Or Apicoectomy,
review: Initially, I went for my father's treatment, but after seeing how they were treated, my wife and I went as well because we had tooth problems. Outstanding care was given to the patient. Doctors are wonderful to their patients. doctor Deepa did the root canal,  she was excellent. Each problem has a specialist on staff. If we make an appointment ahead of time, the hospital waiting time is likewise extremely short. Additionally, they make follow-up calls after treatment to see if the patient is doing okay. Thank you, Team

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Deepa thoroughly checked my teeth during my very first visit to a dental clinic for a checkup. She then patiently and completely described the situation and the necessary treatments to keep them healthy and clean. To prevent decay, I underwent scaling, whitening, and minor filling procedures. She worked excellently because I experienced no pain at all during the treatments. I appreciate her warm personality and the way she explained treatment-related issues in detail. Additionally, the clinic is quite clean, and the staff is really helpful. Visit is highly suggested.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The Multispeciality Dental Clinic's doctors are highly knowledgeable and polite, and they have thoroughly described the procedure and the steps required. They made me feel really comfortable and described the procedure while I was there for gum treatment. I was initially hesitant to have the process, but Dr. Deepa's thorough explanation of it helped me feel at ease and I underwent gum surgery with only the slightest amount of discomfort. Thank you very much for your support of the Multispeciality dentistry clinic's doctors and support team. I absolutely support their services.

tags: Value for money,
review: This was my second time visiting Dr. Deepa's clinic, Multispeciality Dental Clinic. I required a single sitting RCT for one tooth and three fillings to be completed. It was my very first RCT experience. As usual, the doctor was pleasant and took care of my issues within two days (checkup and treatment), as I was about to leave the city. She even agreed to do the treatment on her day off. The RCT procedure was quick and painless and comfortable, which is very different from the stories my parents have told me about receiving treatment elsewhere. Overall, I am pleased and would definitely recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I've gone to the dentist since I was a young child, and I'm now 67. I've had tooth issues my entire life and have seen numerous dentists as a result. My search for a reputable dentist is now done. The members of Dr. Deepa Singh's team are great professionals. My dental issues were treated with the utmost attention by them. Throughout my treatment, every single step was described to me. Dr. Deepa was very sensitive of the fact that dental procedures take time and always made me feel at ease.

The entire staff is quite well-behaved. I used to have a lot of anxiety before having implant surgery, but now I would suggest that anyone who needs it visit Dr. Deepa, my dentist. God be with her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: The dentist and their team took the time to hear the patient's worries, thoroughly explain the cause of the dental problem, and provide treatment options with the advantages and disadvantages of each. Additionally, the doctor prepared thoroughly for the procedure itself and spent time outlining the steps of the selected treatment method. The clinic's staff also effectively communicated regarding making and changing appointments. For any dental-related issues, I would suggest this doctor to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Going to the dentist may rank among the most stressful or terrifying experiences in life, but with Dr. Deepa in the picture, one can feel at peace.
I've been visiting Dr. Deepa for my dental problems for over 7 years, and I'll keep doing so as long as she practises dentistry!
While operating on her patients, she is very kind and friendly and makes you feel at ease.
I've previously visited her for several teeth fillings, a few tooth extractions, and a wisdom tooth extraction. Since I have a very low threshold for pain and am a very difficult patient to manage, I can confirm that all three surgeries were completely painless

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I wanted to thank everyone at your clinic for referring me to you recently. They were able to schedule my root canal for the same day as my short examination! I want to thank Dr. Deepa for her excellent job because the procedure was quick and much simpler than I expected. I can't express my thanks to you enough for the superb treatment and results. I had no pain, no heat or cold sensations, no biting pain, nothing once the numbness subsided! It was the best outcome of a root canal I've ever experienced. You have my highest recommendation, and I will!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Deepa Singh is a highly skilled dentist who practices thorough dentistry. Her careful and scientific approach enables her to generate confidence in her patients, a unique talent. She explains the issues and how they are resolved in great detail and with great transparency.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had issue with my geetha from long time & the pain was not tolerable but the doc. Mam clear all these with only 1st visit, I actually enjoyed the treatment.
Positive atmosphere

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited a dentist for the first time in my life. Had a perception in mind that all the dental treatments are painfull. I faced a severe sensitivity in my molar tooth. Dr Deepa cleared all my doubts and explained me the root cause and precautions. My Root Canal treatment was done smoothly with no pain. 
Came here with a toothache and left with a smile.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I saw Dr. Deepa to get my grandmother's old, cracked crown replaced. The clinic is located in a convenient location. My grandmother was anxious about receiving treatment at such an elderly age, but Dr. Deepa calmed her concerns by thoroughly describing the options available and the course of treatment. In as few appointments as possible, the treatment was carried out and effectively finished. Anybody looking for dental treatments should contact Dr. Deepa, in my opinion.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Deepa Singh for a tooth implant and extraction. The entire process was incredibly painless and smooth. Dr. Neetu is a skilled and knowledgeable clinical expert. She relaxes you and answers all of your questions. The clinic is situated extremely conveniently and is well-equipped. It's a blessing to have a fantastic dentist like Dr. Deepa Singh.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Deepa Singh was very helpful and understanding. Since I have a serious gag problem, getting dental work done is really challenging. She treated me well, spent a lot of time with me, and was really patient. I couldn't believe my treatment was over. She handled me using several methods so I could get the filling done without gagging. She comes highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor informed me that I needed a root canal since one of my molar teeth had become decayed. I didn't experience any pain throughout this procedure, which took its time but went smoothly. I recommend Dr. Deepa Singh because she was very kind, compassionate, and skilled in treating my damaged tooth's cavity following a painless root canal. Thank you so much, and I strongly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a pretty wonderful experience. I visited Dr. Deepa Singh for a dental cleaning and a problem with my bleeding gums. I have to praise her on how she interacts with her patients. She is incredibly patient and pays close attention to every little thing. After  cleaning and gum treatment, my gums recovered without experiencing much discomfort. Dr. Deepa, thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: For the past 12 years, Dr. Deepa Singh has been my doctor. Most significantly, she has a steady hand and is a very skilled doctor who helps the patient feel comfortable during treatment. State-of-the-art equipment in a clean and hygienic clinic. I underwent an RCT and a dental implant, and I am completely satisfied with both treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was quite anxious before having my wisdom teeth extracted. My questions were politely answered by Dr. Deepa, who also detailed the entire procedure. I felt nothing during the quick and painless extraction that took less than 15 minutes. Another tooth needed gum surgery, which was also painless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you to Dr. Deepa Singh and the entire Multispeciality Dental Clinic staff for being such wonderful carers for their patients. I came here for the first time, had a positive experience, and felt at ease and confident about receiving treatment from this facility. I'm done with my surgical tooth extraction. All of you who are looking for dental care with the most recent technology should go here because the doctor and the staff genuinely care about their patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am quite happy with my treatment. I had an accident and broke my front teeth. I was in a lot of tension because my smile and appearance had drastically changed. I visited Dr. Deepa Singh for this. She reassured me it will be alright. In one session, a painless RCT was done, followed by placing of metal-free zirconia caps. The whole procedure was hassle-free and really comfortable. The caps perfectly match my natural teeth. She performed each step of the process flawlessly. Many thanks, Ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The dental hygienist was excellent! , friendly, professional. She did an awesome job cleaning my teeth and giving me educational tips and information.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wisdom tooth was causing pain in my lower jaw, which I had been experiencing for about a month. Before coming here, I saw two dentists, both of whom recommended medication and claimed that removing my tooth would be difficult due to its deep position. The Multispecialty Dental Clinic was recommended to me by my friend Ragini. My surgical extraction was fully done by Dr. Deepa & Dr. Ritesh, and it was a very comfortable experience. I enjoyed the hospitality, ambiance, and cleanliness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Dr. Deepa for a repeat RCT on a tooth that had already been treated elsewhere, but I ended up getting an infection that caused my gums to swell. The doctor has a lot of knowledge and is an expert user of cutting-edge technology. She performed my RCT with the most recent technologies. I'm pleased I found this location because I would have lost my tooth else.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I were given expert advise at Multispeciality Dental Clinic after coming with a damaged front tooth and being really unhappy with my smile. In the past, I had been too afraid to visit a dentist. I felt at ease discussing my issue with Dr. Deepa since she is so kind. My treatment was handled skillfully, and I am happy with my smile. Thank you, Dr. Deepa I now have a lovely smile.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: For the past two days, my tooth has been hurting and infected. So, I just went to the Multispeciality Dental Clinic and scheduled an appointment with Dr. Deepa Singh. She listened to my problems with a great deal of patience. She explains the procedure in detail, and the entire extraction process went without any difficulties. Her team is fantastic and very welcoming. Thank you Dr. Deepa for a wonderful experience and the painless extraction of my teeth that she conducted!!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: So, even though this wasn't the first time I opted for scaling, I went to see Dr. Deepa Singh this time. To be quite honest, I had a great experience dealing with Dr. Deepa. Being a skilled dentist, she initially described the entire process and gave me assurances regarding the outcomes. As she had promised, the outcomes were exact. She is definitely someone I would return to see, and I would also suggest to anyone searching for a decent dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Deepa Singh is a master at what she does. She is completely knowledgeable about the procedures. For my rct, post-and-core, and filling treatments, I visited her. I have to add that I am happy with the treatments. She explains the problems to you and makes appropriate recommendations on how to proceed. Thankfulness, Dr. Deepa

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I have to suggest Dr. Deepa to everyone, especially to senior citizens. I visited for my father for a re-root canal, and he is quite happy with how she handled the entire procedure. She saw to it that the infection was entirely eradicated. Overall, a very positive experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My RCT, which I had completed elsewhere, was unsuccessful.Dr. Deepa performed my re RCT, and she was quite friendly and helpful in explaining the entire process.She responded to all of my inquiries, which I had a lot of out of fear of failing it once more.I'll heartily suggest Her.Regards, Dr. Deepa!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: After visiting numerous dental clinics, I eventually found out about Dr. Deepa . she is such an amazing person and an expert in her field, and since their services are of the highest standard and their costs are competitive with those of other clinics. I would wholeheartedly recommend this clinic to everyone because of the excellent services and care they provide.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Prior to seeing Dr. Deepa Singh, I had a few very unpleasant dental experiences that caused me to avoid dental clinics, and my dental health continued to deteriorate. Her meticulous expertise not only inspired trust in doctors but also motivated me to receive complete dental treatment. We salute you, Dr. Deepa Singh, for your exemplary professionalism.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** ***** ** ************** ***** *** ****** The following are the aspects of my RCT treatment experience that I want to mention.

1. She thoroughly explains every step of the process.

2. She checks to see if the patient is experiencing any discomfort or becoming anxious.

3. She is a PROFESSIONAL in her field. Her craftsmanship is excellent.

4. I would definitely recommend receiving treatment from Doctor Deepa if you are a first-time RCT patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: I had a problem with one of my teeth and was thinking about extraction, but Dr. Deepa Singh thoroughly explained that the tooth could be saved and that the issue was merely decay. Overall, I was pleased with the treatment because it went smoothly, had no problems, and was painless.
